original_text: As it is written, “Whoever gathered much had nothing left over, and whoever gathered little had no lack.”
korean_text: 기록된 것 같이 많이 거둔 자도 남지 아니하였고 적게 거둔 자도 모자라지 아니하였느니라

sentences.original_text: Whoever gathered much had nothing left over,
sentences.korean_translation: 많이 모은 자는 남은 것이 없고,

sentences.original_text: and whoever gathered little had no lack.”
